name: Tavuk
description:
Greetings!

Tavuk is a top down shooter game where we have to protect our field from invading chickens

Does It Have a Story?

Tavuk (which means chicken) is a game about our main character Mr. Bread's effort for growing his children. Mr. Bread is a lonely bread who tries to produce wheat to make himself some friends. 

This game was made in 72 hours with Harvest theme for Ludum Dare 52 hosted by Ludum Dare

Gameplay & Controls

Your main goal in the game is to grow wheat in your fields.
You can sow your seeds in your field after selecting the seed sac by using the mouse wheel.



While you are growing your wheat, there will be chickens who want to attack your wheats. You can shoot them away with your water gun.



Well, how to play this game?

Move: W, A, S, D
Change Item: Scroll Wheel
Interact: LMB

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like Stardew Valley and Enter the Gungeon
• People in the Ludum Dare Community
• Chickens o7
• My little brother who likes to shot me with water gun
• Our friends who are curious about the game we made

System Requirements

You can even play on a Bread
